languages.text: "Да как его не нарушить, когда теперь три вахты подряд горбатиться приходится?! Всех пересжигали же, рук не хватает!"

traits.locale_text: "Да как его не нарушить, когда теперь за пятерых до ночи горбатиться приходится?! Всех пересжигали же!"

languages.text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
languages.original_text: "Да как его не нарушить, когда теперь три вахты подряд горбатиться приходится?! Всех пересжигали же, рук не хватает!"

traits.locale_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three shifts in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
"How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three shifts in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
"How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
"How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
"How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"
"How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

languages.text: “我都已经连续工作三巡了，怎么可能不违反宵禁？你本来可以多找几个人来干活，可你把那些人都烧死了！”
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: “我都已经联系工作三巡了，怎么可能不违反宵禁？你本来可以多找几个人来干活，可你把那些人都烧死了！”

languages.text: 「破るなだなんて、無理だね。３連続で時計を作ったんだぞ？手伝ってほしいくらいだったのに、お前は全部燃やしてしまった！」
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: 「破るなだなんて、無理だね。３連続で時計を作ったんだぞ？手伝ってほしいくらいだったのに、お前は全部燃やしてしまった！」

languages.text: «¿Cómo no iba a violarlo después de trabajar como un esclavo durante tres guardias seguidas? Te vendría bien que te echaran una mano, ¡si no las hubieses quemado todas!».
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo no iba a violarlo después de trabajar como un esclavo durante tres guardias seguidas? Te vendría bien que te echaran una mano, ¡si no las hubieses quemado todas!».

languages.text: "Wie soll ich denn nicht dagegen verstoßen, wenn ich drei Schichten in Folge schuften muss? Ihr könntet mehr Leute brauchen, aber die habt Ihr alle verbrannt!"
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie soll ich denn nicht dagegen verstoßen, wenn ich drei Schichten in Folge schuften muss? Ihr könntet mehr Leute brauchen, aber die habt Ihr alle verbrannt!"

languages.text: « Et comment j'étais censé ne pas l'enfreindre après avoir enchaîné trois tours de garde ? On manque d'effectifs, mais vous, vous passez votre temps à brûler ceux qui pourraient nous aider ! »
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: « Et comment j'étais censé ne pas l'enfreindre après avoir enchaîné trois tours de garde ? On manque d'effectifs, mais vous, vous passez votre temps à brûler ceux qui pourraient nous aider ! »

languages.text: "Üst üste üç nöbet boyunca kölelik ettikten sonra ihlalden nasıl kaçalım? Fazladan adama ihtiyaç vardı ama gidip hepsini yaktınız!"
languages.original_text: "How was I supposed to not violate it, after slaving away for three watches in a row? You could use some extra hands but you've burned them all!"

traits.locale_text: "Üst üste üç nöbet boyunca kölelik ettikten sonra nasıl ihlal etmeyebilirdim ki? Ekstra yardım eline ihtiyacınız var ama hepsini yaktınız!"
